title: Service-Learning-Based Professional Competency Development for Language Specialists

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and general understanding of professional fields
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented education program linked to community language support projects

learning_goals: Through community language service projects, professional communication competencies can be applied to specific case scenarios.
Reflective journaling after service-learning activities achieves over 80% of the target progress in forming social responsibility.
Collaboration strategies to mediate conflicts arising during team-based service tasks can be implemented at least three times.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
